hero.title: FlorenceEGI

hero.description: A complete platform to create, trade and manage EGI digital certificates with integrated environmental impact.

intro.title: What is FlorenceEGI?
intro.concept: FlorenceEGI is the platform that enables the Digital Renaissance: an ecosystem where art, technology and sustainability meet to create shared value.

items.title: Authenticity
items.before: Widespread counterfeiting, falsifiable paper certificates, uncertain provenance
items.after: Cryptographic digital signature, immutable provenance on blockchain, instant verification

items.title: Artist Royalties
items.before: Artist earns only on first sale, no benefit from resales
items.after: Automatic royalties on every resale, percentages defined in smart contract

items.title: Environmental Impact
items.before: Energy-hungry blockchains, no environmental contribution, greenwashing
items.after: Algorand carbon-negative, integrated EPP, measurable impact

creation.title: Creation Engine
creation.description: The creation engine: upload, minting, traits configuration and smart contracts.

market.description: The integrated marketplace: listing, offers, auctions and direct sales.

distribution.title: Distribution Engine
distribution.description: Automatic distribution: royalties, EPP and split payments.

governance.title: Governance Engine

analytics.description: Data analysis: dashboards, reports and insights.
